Reviews.Content: I started out with the first generation iPad, which was a gift to me.  Compared to it, the mini iPad is much easier to handle, weights less and is still supported by Apple, unlike the first generation iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great for college students!
Reviews.Author: Nat
Reviews.Content: I'm a nursing student and I use my ipad mini as my reference book for creating my patient care plans. It saves time and is definitely worth every penny. Not to mention the size is perfect for carrying it along in my handbag. I highly recommend this for college students!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent !!
Reviews.Author: RONISVALDO RIBEIRO DOS SANTOS
Reviews.Content: Very good product as shown in the page for a very good price !! I recommend, and hope you enjoy like me !

Reviews.Title: ipad is super fun and easy to use
Reviews.Author: L. Bilodeau
Reviews.Content: very user friendly. bought this for my husband who never got on a computer in the past. He loves it and is on it all the time exploring. He feels computer competent now. :-)

Reviews.Title: Great product, great company!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed a while back when my iPad mini stopped working only two months after the warranty expired, and the Apple store told me I would have to buy a new one. I decided to call them, doubting they would help me. They had all of my info in the system, and one of the senior advisors worked with me to get my nearest Apple store to make sure I got the exact same iPad (replacement) free of charge! As for the iPad Mini itself, the device is excellent, and does everything that a student could ask for and more. Highly recommend this device, and if something happens to it, be sure to take it into the Apple Store, and definitely call them up if that doesn't help. They really seem to genuinely care about their customers.

Reviews.Title: Hard to beat the Mini!!
Reviews.Author: JP
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife & she really loves it. Very seldom does she even put it down, and did I mention it is a Apple!!

Reviews.Title: Delightful
Reviews.Author: A. Somers
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a gift and got to try it out briefly before giving it and it really works nice. Finding out how to turn it off was something I had to googke search but that worked out nice. I first tried a tablet computer in 2012 and it so big and clunky! The minis are just great they do the same thing without the added risk of dropping and breaking because of the size being too big. This one was easy to handle and pick up and hold to play with it other than me having to do a little searching real fast to find out how to turn it off. The screen and borders look nice. It got here in perfect condition with all its accessories! The white color shines and is easy to look at and clean! I checked it and it operates just fine! The database on google helped me learn how to turn it off because that was really confusing at first. It's a virgin item, as far as I know, no one other than me turned it on, it wasn't a reused item which is good to know, considering the review up top. Really good buy!

Reviews.Title: Gift for the Parentals
Reviews.Author: Lee Bowers
Reviews.Content: Send as an xmas gift this year. Shipped quickly and arrived with no issue given the busy holiday season. Has been easy for the folks to learn and now they facetime with the grandkids like old pros ;)

Reviews.Title: I love it it works great. It's good for work.
Reviews.Author: Victor Castro
Reviews.Content: I like it works good i have no problem at all I use it for work my kids use it to play there games

Reviews.Title: a new Mini iPad for an amazing price delivered to my door
Reviews.Author: Richard W Capin II
Reviews.Content: The 64 GB Mini is exactly what I have looking for,  a new Mini iPad for an amazing price delivered to my door! Could not have asked for a better transaction, very smooth and effortless!

Reviews.Title: The only tablet for the person on the go !
Reviews.Author: Bill Warren
Reviews.Content: The iPad Mini is my right hand . Email , books , magazines , weather , appointment book , alarm clock ,  and so much more . I will not be caught without it .Note I ordered it for next day delivery . I got it at 9:00 am the next morning !!! Amazon you people are awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Nice!
Reviews.Author: Steven Plumb
Reviews.Content: Great price, prompt delivery, and it's an Apple!12 more words required...? For what? I'm happy, and still have not (oops reached my limit)Seriously, this was my best Christmas gift given.

Reviews.Title: Very pleasantly supprised
Reviews.Author: R. H. Thomason
Reviews.Content: I've never been a big fan of Apple as they always seem too controlling........I've been around this industry for a lot of years.  Earlier this year I bought my first tablet from Wal Mart.  The price was right and the tablet worked fine but the battery life was 1 day at best.  Also, I have challenges with skype on it and I use skype a lot.I decided a few weeks ago to order an iPad Mini as my daughter has used one for a while and has really been please with it.I received my order a few days ago and am already impressed.  The battery life is outstanding.  I can use it for several days without recharging.It is taking a bit to get used to it but I would have to say that Apple has done a great job here.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Ella Gentry
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product. I purchased it for my work ipad, it is the perfect size for what I need.

Reviews.Title: iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: Sarah Barton
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad Mini!  I've used it less than a week, but it's a keeper!  It holds power well, and surfs the net smoothly.  Even when the power is dropping, it doesn't seem to majorly effect the efficiency of this product. I am pleased with the camera, makes beautiful clear pictures, and very nice videos.  Already, I've downloaded free books from Apple, and the print is very easy to see.  I have yet to try it on our HDMI television, but that is next! Couldn't be happier with this product, you can never go wrong with anything Mac.  No more 1 million and one things grinding in the background, like every PC I've ever had!

Reviews.Title: Will Amazon let this review stand?
Reviews.Author: Cycist "SciFi fan"
Reviews.Content: I had the kindle fire but was having constant problems with some of the apps, mostly the newspaper apps.  Got tired of this, gave my kindle fire to a friend, got this and am very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: Suzy Sunshine
Reviews.Content: I've had my mini for a while and I'm so glad I decided to switch from the iPad 2 to the iPad Mini!  I did get the mini with more memory and it's great.  The ease of using it is something I was wanting because I have severe Rheumatoid Arthritis, so the Mini is light and to hold and carry.  I would recommend it to my daughter and may just be buying her one for her birthday or Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: JESSICA
Reviews.Content: Delivery service amazing.  Called apple when it came in and it's brand new never owned, I am the first owner. Couldn't be happier with the product and b&e; who sold it to me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Love it I even put Armor on it
Reviews.Author: Erick Vasquez Peralta
Reviews.Content: Very Very Very ... Pleased with this product and how it work for what I need... Thank your for having it .. and have a wonderful day.

Reviews.Title: Ordered used but came factory wrapped
Reviews.Author: Lee T.
Reviews.Content: Ordering my electronics used saves me so much money and I'm getting a new quality item. I'm really glad I got the iPad since I already have other Apple products, including my iPhone so the iPad is sharing all of my info and apps from my iPhone. I almost got the Kindle but since I didn't need it to read, it wasn't the best product for me.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: james bernard
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase !! Love the iPad  !!! Amazon is the perfect place to fine great deals for a cheap price.

Reviews.Title: Screen shatters easily! Get an Otterbox wih this!
Reviews.Author: G. Grazian
Reviews.Content: The screen of my ipad mini shattered within 4 months. It costs twice more to repair it than the regular ipad. One repair shop asked $75.00 more than I paid for the ipad. The cheapest place was an online business that asks $180.00 for this repair.I liked the size and functionality of this mini and it suited most of my needs. Unfortunately, I will not buy, again

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Patti OReilly
Reviews.Content: I love it. So easy to use. Only wish I could print from it. I use it for reading and searching the web

Reviews.Title: Exactly what i was looking for
Reviews.Author: Jorge Olazagasti
Reviews.Content: A friend lent me this mini i pad while my desktop was being replaced.I've gotten so fond of it that i bought a new one. it's being used more often than my new desktop! It's great as a portable backup at a price far below local retailers.

Reviews.Title: How did I get along without it?
Reviews.Author: framusmn
Reviews.Content: I really like my new iPad mini and so does my granddaughter! I've had a lot of fun trying out all the fabulous apps and games.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: JCD
Reviews.Content: What a great size!  I bought this for my son and I'm wishing I had bought one for myself.  The size seems more convenient than the iPad.  As with all of the Apple products, this is a great product and very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Useful for seniors to read books
Reviews.Author: Loretta Ramseyer
Reviews.Content: I have disabilities that make it hard for me to hold and read books.  The iPad mini makes reading a pleasure again.  A wide variety of books can be read on this iPad.  This size is better than the full size iPad because I can easily hold it in one hand while reading and turning pages.  Another benefit is that the small size fits easily in most  pockets and handbags.

Reviews.Title: IT's AN IPAD
Reviews.Author: Burninglancer
Reviews.Content: what else is their to say IT's and IPAD you know what it does and how it works. so yeah!

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: TRE GORDON
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for someone and so far it seems to be working fine. If it continues I will be ordering another one down the road for myself. It arrived much faster than expected which I really appreciated. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Grandson loves it
Reviews.Author: jean Melvin
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for grandson's 6th birthday. It was a success, he completely loves it.  It is easily for him to operate and enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Great working condition!
Reviews.Author: Olivia Guido
Reviews.Content: This device came with a bluetooth keyboard when I got it but it did not work because it did not come with a charger. When I asked them to send me one, they sent me a completely new keyboard and charger! Awesome!

Reviews.Title: iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: James Bennie
Reviews.Content: The iPad mini itself was fantastic, but the charger that came with it was too small to charge the device quickly & efficiently.

Reviews.Title: Change of heart.
Reviews.Author: Aarron S
Reviews.Content: I'm not much of an apple guy . But I have to say , this iPad mini is one sweet little machine  .

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed with condition
Reviews.Author: Jaziel Damian
Reviews.Content: The item said "like new", but i was very dissapointed to realized that it had several not minor scratches .

Reviews.Title: Awesome product and seller
Reviews.Author: Keith A Nansteel
Reviews.Content: Title says it all. My son in law has the full size iPad and I didn't want to carry a full size device. The mini is perfect. The seller was great too. Fast shipping exactly as advertised. I actually bought two and will buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: GF loves it
Reviews.Author: James Carmen "koolaid"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my girlfriend for our 3rd year anniversary, and she loves it. I was skeptical since it was bought from a third party vendor on amazon, but i am please to say it is what i ordered. It was nicely sealed and packaged and did not move in the box when shipped. 5 stars for the price

Reviews.Title: iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Bridgett
Reviews.Content: Love itIt is lightI can just slip it into my purse and goAnd sitting reading a good book, my arm does not get tired

Reviews.Title: LOVE!
Reviews.Author: Miranda H.
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad mini for my brother who is a Marine so he can Skype us and have something to do during his free time. Then I had to buy one for myself because I loved the size of the screen compared to the bigger iPads. The only thing I don't like is that there's no flash for the camera.

Reviews.Title: The perfect size
Reviews.Author: L. Patrick "Seaside Photography Cape Cod"
Reviews.Content: I have a full size ipad, which i love, but it is too large to bring along at times.  Tne mini is the ideal size.

Reviews.Title: love my mimi
Reviews.Author: Patricia Starke
Reviews.Content: Love it....works great I fun on just the right size for me to work on at work an home thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: Re: IPad mini
Reviews.Author: deobrah skucas
Reviews.Content: Love it!!  It fills all my needs!! It's fast & compact - fits right in my purse so I can take it any where!

Reviews.Title: Nice and handy
Reviews.Author: Joan
Reviews.Content: I love this ipad,it's perfect size just put it in your handbag. There's so much information you can have at your fingertips!Every one should have one,thanks for such a nice product.

Reviews.Title: Must buy an iPad mini!!!!
Reviews.Author: Aaron Brown
Reviews.Content: I am in love with this iPad mini!!!!  I have no problem with the non-retina display.I feel like a normal ipad is way to large.  This fits in your hand perfectly and is definitely large enough to read and watch movies on et cetera

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: David Sauceda Saldivar
Reviews.Content: excellent product, pristine condition, beautiful and good to work, I loved it; I have IPhone 5s so I decided to go for this Tablet too, now I am done with phone and Tablet, good companion for my phone.

Reviews.Title: It's an Ipad so of course it's great!
Reviews.Author: MommyOf3
Reviews.Content: Definitely saved myself some money here because at any other store you'll be paying more than $300. I do recommend buying a protective case since it's not insured while your on Amazon anyways.

Reviews.Title: Great price, and quick delivery.
Reviews.Author: Michele Mroczek
Reviews.Content: Great price, and quick delivery. I purchased this for myself to read, play games and keep connected. It is so easy and I love it.

Reviews.Title: get my ipad mini in excellent condition
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Padron
Reviews.Content: have an ipad mini is that each should live experience is excellent and thanks amazon and the seller could get and have this product that makes life easier for anyone with its simple menu and simple software startup. Excellent quedarle I have it again thanks for helping me get this product. greetings Leonardo Padron

Reviews.Title: Great Device, Great Apps, Great Present
Reviews.Author: S. Whitaker "AMAZEME"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife when she told me she was admiring one that her student had. She is freaking in love with this thing now! I think I may need to fight it for her time. LOL.Great size for those who don't want to lug around a 10 inch device and large enough display to allow for crisp, clean images. I am now my wife's hero thanks to the Apple iPad mini!

Reviews.Title: No manual?
Reviews.Author: Dolores R Berube
Reviews.Content: I was expecting some kind of a manual or directions to come with the iPad mini.  I set it up according to all the prompts but still having trouble with it telling me my password or Apple ID# I entered is incorrect.

Reviews.Title: Just Perfect
Reviews.Author: Fernando Asturias
Reviews.Content: It works smooth and quality is clearly the best in the market. It is an Apple product. Do I need to say more?

Reviews.Title: Came very fast
Reviews.Author: T.George
Reviews.Content: I highly reccomend this because of the quality, speed of shipment and the great price you would be missing out if you dont get this.

Reviews.Title: Loving It
Reviews.Author: Cheri M. Hauck
Reviews.Content: i love IT its so portable and convenient to carry with you light weight but not fragil and i can charge it in my car at home or where ever i happen to be

Reviews.Title: Great for small hands
Reviews.Author: sharin101
Reviews.Content: I'll be 70 yr. old in a couple months.  I haven't used a tablet before and only had a "dumb" phone until recent. I'm not tech efficient. However, this product is intuitive and reasonably easy to learn.  My hands are quite small so having a smaller tablet is perfect for me.  Truly enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Bad charger
Reviews.Author: Lewkop
Reviews.Content: I love my mini, but I've had it one month and the charger  doesn't work.  I am quite upset that I have to go out and purchase a new charger. Apple should make a charger that lasts as long as the iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad mini
Reviews.Author: Don
Reviews.Content: My wife uses it and likes it much better than my Ipad II. Has all the features and is much lighter to carry and hold.

Reviews.Title: it's alright
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: wish I didn't have to pay for the games on here  also when you tell it to tell jokes it doesn't  know any I mean come on.

Reviews.Title: Ipad mini
Reviews.Author: Terri L. place
Reviews.Content: This item was bought for my son. It helps him with his school work as well as play time. He loves it.

Reviews.Title: my I pad mini.
Reviews.Author: michelle stanbury
Reviews.Content: It's great to carry around, it's sleek and flat I can just put it in my pocketbook and go.one of my best purchases from azon.

Reviews.Title: Amazing.
Reviews.Author: Kristin Kalakay
Reviews.Content: I like the size... Very convenient and better than staring at my iPhone screen. Very light and worth the price.

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Mireille Shebaya
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved this iPad mini. The apple store did not have the 32G model (1st generation). Pleasantly surprised it was selling amazon and am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Works great and my son absolutely loves!
Reviews.Author: lovelyevenstar
Reviews.Content: The title says it all. Got it for my lil guy and he loves. Seems like he loves it a little too much and is on it far too often,LOL. Anyways shipped quickly, came in perfect condition and I bought him a really nice case to go with it that is able to withstand all the 'mishaps' he continually has with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Media Toy
Reviews.Author: Caleb
Reviews.Content: Not the newest iPad out but still great. With the 3G model I can get internet access when i need it!

Reviews.Title: happy birthday
Reviews.Author: Queen
Reviews.Content: My son love this also he is 15 so I promised him if he did well in schoolI would get it for his birthday he loves it

Reviews.Title: great tablet even for children.
Reviews.Author: Paulo A. Borelli
Reviews.Content: lots of games and education tools. My children love it. We have already two for the three children (some disputes occur...).

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: G. Holmes "Taking care of the house"
Reviews.Content: It's an ipad -- it's great. It works just like the other ipads that we have and the size is great

Reviews.Title: iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Jeanine Neilson
Reviews.Content: I love this product, I am a recent Apple convert and I'll never go back. Easy to use, set up, and navigation is a breeze! I am so happy with my purchase, it is priced to move the only complaint I have is with the delivery. My iPad mini was left balanced on top of my gate where it could have been stolen or fallen off to break, I was home waiting for it to be delivered and there is no excuse for that. BTW,...it wasn't shipped via a big service or the usps,...

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Alvin Melendez
Reviews.Content: It was in perfect condition tyvm for everything. Love the product and i use all the time now. Very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Veryyyyyyyyyyy pleased
Reviews.Author: Rhea
Reviews.Content: It arrived will packaged and in excellent shape.  This used iPad looks and works like a brand new one with out the price.  It was just what the seller said it was.  Very pleased with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Willie
Reviews.Content: Serves the purpose, works well, decent battery life. It was a gift for the school age girl, and she is very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: BARBARA WONG
Reviews.Content: it's easy to carry. This i-pad is IOS 6, but I could upgrade to IOS 7. So it's more cheaper now.

Reviews.Title: It`s awesome
Reviews.Author: Sofia
Reviews.Content: It`s awesome i love it. I do everything on the ipad from work to check my social networks. it hurt because it came with a manufacturing defect in the apple store but they changed me immediately by Apple warranty

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad mini
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R Reeder
Reviews.Content: Once I figured how to use it, I like it.  There should be an instruction book with it.  Through a mixup w order cart two were sent to me and charged also, although I had deleted  one of them on my order.  Was rather disappointed by that. Didn't bother returning it , as I figured that would be goofed up too.

Reviews.Title: Everything in one!!!
Reviews.Author: Gwen Dominick
Reviews.Content: Love the size. Carries all my documents. Email. Texting.  Pix. Need I say more!! I have bought one for family members as well!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product!!
Reviews.Author: JAY
Reviews.Content: Wonderful device, I enjoy the ability to transfer data off of my iPhone to my iPad and the easy to carry size of the iPad mini.

Reviews.Title: Don't know why I waited this long!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Shadle
Reviews.Content: I'm thoroughly enjoying my iPad mini.  I've used it almost as much for essential communications as I have for entertaintainment.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad Mini
Reviews.Author: LINDA D MANUPPELLI
Reviews.Content: Nice and light and did everything my granddaughter needed it to do.  I especially the lightness compared to my regular size I pad.

Reviews.Title: Not dazzling, but I love it
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I purchased the iPad Mini as a replacement for my aging Nook Color e-reader and a larger companion to my iPhone. Overall I'm thrilled. It arrived in perfect condition and works beautifully. It's light, fast, and the 32-gig version holds all of my apps and pictures with plenty of room to spare.Docking a star because it takes far too long to charge.Finally, if you can afford to spend a little extra for the new Mini with retina display, I recommend it. The resolution and camera quality on this version of the are disappointing for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great experience
Reviews.Author: Brad Umbrianna
Reviews.Content: I got it earlier than expected and it works perfectly. I love it. Looking forward to upgrading my iPhone later this year.

Reviews.Title: I pad
Reviews.Author: Melissa Holsinger
Reviews.Content: My son loves it and the product has worked out wonderful for my son and his needs.  Price a little to high

Reviews.Title: My classroom buddy
Reviews.Author: MDSquared
Reviews.Content: Been super handy and helpful classroom companion (especially after teacher banned laptops in class, but not tablets!). Love the many apps. For class notes, I use Notability (with built in recording feature) and for pdf reading I use Good Read. iOS 7 is also a pleasure. Love the design and feel of it. That said I still prefer doing most intensive tasks on my laptop, but the iPad is a great addition to my tech device team. :)

Reviews.Title: small and fun
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this for the gym. I can watch movies and do cardio. Love it and for me a perfect fit.

Reviews.Title: Love the mini!!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Prince
Reviews.Content: My order came quick and was in perfect condition! Quality service. I love the mini iPad because it is easy the handel and fits great in my purse. I use it for everything. Work, Fun and studying! I call it my life...wouldn't go anywhere without it!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: M. Prescott
Reviews.Content: This was for my granddaughter and she loves it.  She always used mine, so we got her this for Christmas and now she can download her own music and games and not fill mine up with stuff I don't like.

Reviews.Title: So so product has flaws
Reviews.Author: Elegance  @ the job site
Reviews.Content: Same deal as everywhere else , but issue with shut down continues to exit safari and mail without notification no fix provided for this as of yet  (closes apps unexpectedly )

Reviews.Title: Money saver!!
Reviews.Author: Andrew L. Dorsey
Reviews.Content: I purchased it used, and couldn't even tell it. This was a great investment. I'm not sure what the retinae display does for you, but I made the right decision on the used on. Saved me tons.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: justin olivo
Reviews.Content: Ipad was in great shape and is worling prefevt, shipping was on timw as well. The ingraving is small snd with a case you donr have to worry about it

Reviews.Title: Not what I ordered, but it will do
Reviews.Author: J Monster
Reviews.Content: The product was sent and delivered on time. Packaging was good. Everything looked great! ...until I opened the box. I placed an order for a Silver unit, and they sent me a white one. Not the worst thing that could happen, but worth noting none the less.... Especially for something with this kind of price tag.

Reviews.Title: What I Expected and More
Reviews.Author: Robert D Case
Reviews.Content: Just love the little guy as I wanted to face time my sisters. Enjoy the graphics and speed. Nice and light.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Byrdtn
Reviews.Content: I have always wanted an ipad and now I have one!! For 32GB I thought it was a great price!! I also like that I can sync in to my iphone.

Reviews.Title: Just wht the doctor ordered!
Reviews.Author: Original Settler
Reviews.Content: I got it for my granddaughter who received an award for never missing a day of her kindergarten class.  It's a perfectly sized for her little hands and fingers.  She's very adept at it whether she's sitting, standing, laying or hanging upside down.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: Its awesome, and really useful so go ahead and buy it if you want because its just excellent ha ha ha

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Jessica Alvarez Matta
Reviews.Content: Excellent really liked the weight, and function. Adapting to the size, smaller than I thought . But really good product, quick deliver! Price is equal to apple.com

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Debgoddess "Debra Kiawahgal"
Reviews.Content: As always Apple makes the most excellent products. This is great, a smaller size, sotake into account if you wear reading glasses you might want the regular size iPad.But this is wonderful and you can do so many things with it. Easy to carry anywhere.Apple always has my vote of 5 stars! I've never been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: iPad rules
Reviews.Author: Neal Cardin
Reviews.Content: Love it. Our second one and nothing better than  apple. Powerful easy to use. Works great and love the size.

Reviews.Title: Apple I pad mIni.
Reviews.Author: J. L. P.
Reviews.Content: I love my apple pad. The size is so cool to use. I use it for my business with the square.com Credit Card Reader.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. She's been using our daughter's ipad 3rd generation and she said that this ipad mini is the perfect size for her. It fits in her small purse and is easy to hold with one hand. Someone at her workplace who was considering buying a samsung tablet changed his mind when he saw her ipad mini. I was a little hesitant to order this on amazon because some people's review say that they're getting items that don't seem brand new and looking like they're pre-owned. Well, so far I never had any problems with amazon orders so I based my decision on that. When my wife opened the package, I asked her if it looked brand new and she said that it doesn't get any newer than how it looks. So the other reviews remain hearsay to me.

Reviews.Title: iPad Mini = Great
Reviews.Author: Jaime Clayborne
Reviews.Content: It's great, I love it, no issues and I will definetly be coming back for more of my electronic needs.

Reviews.Title: Girlfriend loves it
Reviews.Author: love the water
Reviews.Content: Got this for my girlfriend since she likes to travel a lot. It is also great for work. Would recommend and purchase again. Happy wife....happy life :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect size.
Reviews.Author: Sean Anderson
Reviews.Content: Everything you love about your iPhone, but much more useful for at-home time. Light, awesome battery, and the same high hardware quality of any Apple product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Katie E. Small
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed. It's lightweight, portable, easy to use, and came with it's own charging cable. Great product and a better deal than on Apple's site.

Reviews.Title: Definitely buy it
Reviews.Author: Jhonatan Zepeda
Reviews.Content: This is a really awesome product.. I'm really happy with it.. I love it..!! I would definitely buy another one..!!

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong
Reviews.Author: Pam M.
Reviews.Content: What can I say. I love the Ipad mini. Easy to carry and has all the functionality of a full iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great product, no charging cables
Reviews.Author: Justin Price
Reviews.Content: Works great, and is in great condition. Came in plastic bag without charging cables, or headphones. But once I charged it up and used it I am happy

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Scott Roseboro
Reviews.Content: I have a kindle and an I pod. I checked out other tablets and choose this . Delivery was on time  product was exactly as ordered

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Nicole M Brennan

Reviews.Title: Great device

Reviews.Title: WE all love the iPad mini.
Reviews.Author: T. Walter "Bill"
Reviews.Content: I know the price is up there, but honestly, everything TRIES to be link the iPad.you either have it, or you don't.  It is exceptional in the speed and reliability of the device.  With it's A5 processor,  it never lags or has you tapping your fingers waiting for something to finish (other than a sync).I am an old time computer user (over 30 years).... and never liked the idea of the iPad, but since I have one, I can now not live without it.  Might not run like my mac - (Won't run os x applications) but with release of most of the apps I have on my mac, for the IOS device, there is little I can't do on this device.  LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked, so works with T-mobile
Reviews.Author: Matthew Nuzum
Reviews.Content: If you want a device that works with T-mobile's free 200MB for life program, this will work just fine. You simply buy a sim and then activate the plan in the Settings app on the tablet. It starts working right away but does take about 30 minutes before all of the options related to managing your bandwidth and your plan kicks in.

Reviews.Content: Exactly what I ordered! I love Amazon Prime!This iPad mini is exactly what my girlfriend wanted for Christmas. She's been using it non-stop.

Reviews.Title: Great little machine, no need for retina in my opinion.
Reviews.Author: Hanan Y. Jacob "a waxing wellspring"
Reviews.Content: When the mini came out it was just what I wanted, an iPad thin and light enough to use comfortably wherever I needed. The 4G option is great if only for the built-in GPS which is missing in the Wifi version. This device is perfect for reading and carrying around with you wherever you go. It's also been supremely useful as a mobile tether when I've needed to work while out. It's also great to have the big screen for GPS/Waze when you are travelling rather than a mobile phone screen, you get to see a lot more context on the map. I have a retina iPhone and I really don't notice the lack of retina on my mini.Only thing I'd say is 16 gig is small if you want to take lots of photos or load up a few HD movies on it in addition to your music, games, apps etc.I think I'll change up to the retina mini 64 gig w/4G whenever I decide to upgrade, but I'm in no hurry, my mini is great :)

Reviews.Title: I thought it would be too small, I was wrong
Reviews.Author: Chad K
Reviews.Content: As a lifelong (as in, the lifetime of the tablet) user of the large 9-10 inch tablets, i always assumed the smaller tablet market was futile.  I believed the tablets were too small to enjoy web browsing and media.  I didn't see a need for smaller screens because we had smartphones for that type of portability.  But when the iPad mini was deeply discounted at the release of the mini with retina I gave one a shot.  I must say that the mini is amazing.  I'm writing this review on my mini as my iPad air sits one foot away on the table next to my desktop computer.  The mini fills a void I never thought there was.  Its portable yet large enough to comfortably view the screen.  It fits in your large pockets and can easily be carried around.  Its small enough to type quickly on while being held.  It is simply a beautiful tablet that I wish I had purchased sooner.

Reviews.Title: Nice product

Reviews.Content: I love it  I  am on it all the time  it works great on what I use it for it's better than the big one

ONCE WE GOT IT GOING WE FIND IT WILL NOT TAKE A CHARGE. WE MAKE AN APPOINTMENT AT THE LOCAL APPLE STORE WHERE WE FIND OUT THE CHARGER CORD IS DEFECTIVE. WE GET A NEW ONE AND NOW IT WILL CHARGE. THEY TELL US THERE ARE SMALL CLASSES ON HOW TO USE THE IPAD BUT MY WIFE SAYS SHE CAN FIGURE IT OUT ON OUR OWN. IT TAKES GREAT PICTURES SO NOW WE HAVE ABOUT TEN DIFFERENT DEVICES THAT CAN TAKE PICTURES. SMILE!

Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Content: This is the second mini that I have bought for my kids to use in college.  They seem to like them as a way to access texts and other learning resources (as well as all of the entertainment available.)  I personally prefer the larger tablets but they seem to prefer the smaller size.  We've had a lot of experience with Apple products over the past few years (6 macbooks, 5 iphones, 3 ipads, apple TV) and all have been well-built and reliable.  The cost may be higher than similar products but the reliability has been worth it.

I read all the reviews before selecting my first tablet and and thrilled with this one.Admittedly I have not taken the iPad outside to test with my wireless network - I bought it for home use anyway. However I know a lot of people carry those things everywhere (not me).

Reviews.Title: BE AWARE, the wifi-only Mini does not have a GPS chip.
Reviews.Author: M. Kinnamon "martylk2"
Reviews.Content: I'm wishing I'd made a smarter decision on my iPad Mini purchase. I'm regretting it now. Not because it isn't a nice device. But because it lacks a GPS chip. I decided I could live with the low res display and and the iPhone 4S internals. But I didn't know I couldn't navigate with it.I bought a car dock designed for the smaller tablets and was getting ready for some cool navs with my Mini. I tethered it (mine's a wifi-only) to my phone and proceeded to run a route. Unfortunately it wasn't working well. It wasn't following my course or refreshing. Had to be the data signal on my phone or lower spec'd GPS hardware in the Mini, I told myself. After troubleshooting it online I discovered Apple chose not to equip the wifi-only Mini with a GPS chip.Now I'm saddled with a lackluster experience from my brand new iPad Mini. It's still a nice device. Just not a happy-inducing

Reviews.Title: I like it but don't get the hype.
Reviews.Author: Optimus Crymes "disgruntled customer"
Reviews.Content: I have to judge this product based on performance & craftsmanship but I just don't get the hype. It's a nice tablet that you can do a lot with but with all of the commercials, write-ups in blogs and magazines & fanatics making it sound better than world peace or the invention of fire, I expected more.It is well-made, has a great screen size with great viewing for photos, videos & art online & in files. Screen resolution is wonderful. It is great to browse the web & read books/personal files on. I find myself watching videos on this a bunch & it's like having a mini television. The apps it comes with require that you log into or create an apple ID. This is what started my issue with the unit.I've had a nano since they came out & a nice collection of iTunes to jam to. When I tried to log in using the mini, I got locked out of my account & lost access to years of my jams. >:( This really p!ssed me off. All of what they have as feature requires you to meld with the cursed apple App Store. I have no desire to be tied to them like that & feel that they force your hand. I suppose I could've just returned the accursed thing, so I won't harp too much but it did ruffle these feathers!All in all, it's a good product but I did not become more attractive, smarter nor did I suddenly become more popular than I already was.

Reviews.Title: great, not for the vision or tactile impaired
Reviews.Author: CVK
Reviews.Content: try handing this to a senior citizen. its shortfalls will be very apparent.Good:-Beautiful display-Solid build-Light as can be.Bad:-Interface was designed for a 10" device (see Regular iPad), thus touch targets are hard to hit at times.-the size will be just a pinch too big for most female hands or smaller male hands. the pictures of it being gripped from both sides is a bit misleading for the lower end of the bell-curve of population.i've since sold my device and i'll keep my money handy for the next iteration of the iPad (XL?). This device ended up being delegated to checking email and nothing more since it became a hinderance.Your mileage will vary. others i've spoken to love its size and it will fit into their work-flow much easier. it just didn't fit well into mine.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet of its size
Reviews.Author: Monty
Reviews.Content: Okay so I got this as a Christmas present and I fell in love with it the sec I seen it, it fit in my hand perfectly and it is vary lightweight. It is supper fast wish I could of gotten the 3G or 4g on but oh well and it is vary durable I left int in my car when going snowboarding  in  -10 deegres F and when I was done and got back to the car I was afraid it wouldn't work because I had a 3rd gen iPod touch and the scene stopped working because of the cold and yeah then this summer I when down to southern Texas in left it in the car again in 118 degree weather and when I go back that heat warning was on and I waited 15 min and then it worked fine. I have dropped it once or twice from like 3 feet off the ground and nothin has happen but yet 3 feet isn't a lot but I am not just going to drop 10 ft off the ground to see and Siri is amazing they can make her better  by letting her have convstations  with the user but otherwise amazing it is way better than voice control. I would recommend this to anybody who need simple technology. Because me dad is a computer geek and he hates apple product because he said it is technology for dummies haha but yeah I like it a lot so I would say great for teens and young adults.

Reviews.Title: Great form factor, ok power
Reviews.Author: gadget-o-holic
Reviews.Content: I've had the iPad mini since it came out and while I love the form factor of the iPad mini, it is lacking somewhat on the computing power side.  I normally use my iPad while traveling for movies and browsing the internet (travel almost every week for work).  The iPad mini is almost perfect for traveling and browsing the internet but the lack of power really holds it back from getting 5 stars for me.  The iPad mini struggles a bit to play HD movies/shows... I usually use my mini at hotels hooked up via HDMI to the hotel TV so I can watch movies/etc full screen.  I don't have too many issues with playing SD videos but HD videos stutter a lot and are pretty much unwatchable (should be noted that the HD files I used were h264 files in an mkv container and played via an app called Azul).  It would be great if the mini had a retina screen as well because text would be much easier to read.  That being said, I'm still happy with the current gen iPad mini and don't mind the trade off in power and lack of retina for form factor and size.  That being said, if the next gen mini is significantly more powerful and has a retina screen, I know I'm going to be all over it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the elderly, but onscreen buttons are small
Reviews.Author: Miguel Lescano Cornejo
Reviews.Content: My mother learned to use a Windows 7 netbook machine in her 70s. However, the computer got uncomfortably warm and thus was not ideal for using in a sofa. She loves her iPad Mini. I no longer have to worry about viruses, updates rebooting the system, "your computer is too slow" errors on Skype... And a touch interface is certainly a lot more intuitive for people not too familiar with computers.A few of the bad things about this are:-Since it's small, my mother sometimes have to press several times on onscreen buttons until it activates. I guess at least for native apps they could have adjusted the size of the buttons so they remain as easy to press as in a big iPad.-No ability to download music directly to the device to the Music app... Unless you purchase it on iTunes. This is one of the biggest issues preventing iOS devices from being fully independent from computers.-No flash for the back camera-iPhone apps look ugly on it, because they don't display in iPhone 4 resolution, but it iPhone 3GS resolution (pre-retina). This means pixels have to be doubled.An unexpected bonus was:-A fully functional compass. I wish my iPod Touch had one.
